name: Toledot
description:
Tema: I want to be free

Diversificadores: 

Mix it all up: put together two or more genders of the game in a unique way, never seen before.

Cut and paste: the game must include an ability to catch and trade as a mechanism of objects context, characters or mechanics.

Categoría: #PC

Equipo - Mendeleiev

Alfonso Iván Almanza González - Programador
Alexis Octavio Colin Ortiz - Game Designer
Lester Fabian Ramirez Perez - Artista 3D
German Lopez Ochoa - Sound designer
Paul Alvarado Vazquez - Artista 2D
Miriam Karina Melgoza - Artista 2D & UV Painter

Motor usado: Unity

México, Querétaro
